document_data.name: Poison Ivy
document_data.mainbody: '''Poison ivy''' was a species of plant in [[Faerûn]] that was considered [[poison]]ous to handle without protection.
document_data.Habitats: * In [[northwest Faerûn]], poison ivy could be found in the [[Neverwinter Wood]].
document_data.Usages:
* Poison ivy leaves were used as a [[material component]] to cast ''[[irritation]]''.
* [[Wererat]]s had a deadly allergy to poison ivy. Because of this, powdered ivy was used by the [[lycanthrope]]-hunting organization the [[Silver Stake]] in some of their [[Silver Stake gas bombs|''gas bombs'']] alongside powdered [[silver]].{{Cite web/The Search for the Circle of Vehlarr/Part Three}}
